name: Game ZERO -Chapter 1
description:
Game zero is a virtual world about war tactics,
If there is any kind of argument, it will be settled through a visual war tactic,
The heroine is a girl who is in charge of a set (group) with 3 others plus an AI,
They are ranked 3 out of the top 5,
One day their data was hacked by someone with the game name, Midnight

Check out my Devientart

*Any bugs or problems, please tell me
